user_story.i_want: manage issues of membership that arise
user_story.so_that: respond to the needs of members and applicants

givens_list: a membership application has been received
whens_list: I follow the link to process the new membership application
thens_list: I should see a notification of the new membership application
I should be on the Members page
I should see the new member in the list of members
the new member should receive an invitation email
I should no longer see a notification of the new membership application

givens_list: there is a member who has failed to attain the minimum shareholding after 12 months
whens_list: I go to the Members page
thens_list: I should see a notification that the member has failed to attain the minimum shareholding

whens_list: I go to the Members page
thens_list: I should see a notification that the member has resigned
